articles.author: Domenico Montanaro
articles.title: 2024 election poll: Trump vs. Biden and what Republicans and Democrats fear - NPR
articles.description: A new 2024 election poll from NPR/PBS NewsHour/Marist shows fundamental divides over concerns for America's future and what to teach the next generation.
articles.content:
The 2024 presidential race remains extremely close between President Biden and former President Donald Trump, according to the latest polling from NPR/PBS NewsHour/Marist.
Evan Vucci/AP; Eduardo Mun… [+6163 chars]
